_description: This configuration file allows you to customize bark detector behavior

detection._sensitivity_help: Real-time detection sensitivity (0.01-1.0). Higher = more sensitive
detection._analysis_sensitivity_help: Analysis mode sensitivity (0.1-1.0) for comprehensive bark detection in post-analysis. Lower = captures more bark events for legal evidence
detection._sample_rate_help: Audio sample rate in Hz (must be 16000 for YAMNet)
detection._chunk_size_help: Audio processing chunk size in samples
detection._quiet_duration_help: Seconds of quiet before stopping recording
detection._session_gap_threshold_help: Seconds gap to separate recording sessions

calibration._default_profile_help: Name of default calibration profile to load (null = use sensitivity)
calibration._sensitivity_range_help: Min and max sensitivity for calibration sweep
calibration._calibration_steps_help: Number of steps in calibration sweep

scheduling._auto_start_help: Automatically start monitoring at scheduled times
scheduling._timezone_help: Timezone for scheduling (local or IANA timezone)

legal._comment: Legal violation detection thresholds - configurable for different municipal bylaws
legal._constant_violation_duration_help: Constant violation duration threshold in seconds - minimum duration for constant violation (City of Kelowna: 5min = 300s, range: 60-1800s)
legal._intermittent_violation_duration_help: Intermittent barking violation duration threshold in seconds - minimum total duration for intermittent violation (City of Kelowna: 15min = 900s, range: 300-7200s)
legal._intermittent_gap_threshold_help: Gap threshold for intermittent detection in seconds - maximum gap between bark sessions for grouping (5min = 300s, range: 30-1800s)
legal._constant_gap_threshold_help: Gap threshold for constant violations in seconds - maximum gap between barks that invalidates constant violation (10s default, range: 1-60s)
